title: Name Change
body: When I try to change my name to Clyde the name checker tells me it isnt available but when I check his Summoner he hasnt played since almost  years ago. Help?

replies.body:
Are you trying to change your name on the updated client?  It may not give error messages or restrictions when making a name, so it may not actually be available.  You can double check on the legacy client for the specific reason.

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

Let me know if that clears things up!
this might be off topic. but still. this acc was once called puscica and i changed (for obv resons :D) and for some friends that i had the name remained puscica even tho i changed it to JustJuicy

It looks like your name change was fairly recent!  A name change might not appear for a player until they've relogged.  Have your friend logg off and back on to make sure that everything has resync'd.  Hope that helps!
